languages.text: {n}Картинка копирует взгляд из глаз Глейто. Качество ужасное, но можно различить зал, где скульптор проводит зловещий ритуал. Вот Мейв вмешивается в ритуал, и ее с вами соединяет луч варп-энергии. Слышится приказ Соломона. Кадр меняется и вы видите фрейлину, а точнее — себя в теле Мейв, бродящ{mf|его|ую} по улицам Тассеры. Следующий кадр возвращает вас в зал, где Соломон стреляет в алтарь. События на записи отзываются тянущей болью в мышцах и туманом в голове.{/n}

{n}The footage depicts a scene from Glaito's viewpoint. The quality is terrible, but you can make out the hall where the sculptor is conducting the sinister ritual. You see Maive interfere with the ritual, and the beam of warp energy connecting the two of you. You hear Solomorne's command. The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Aufnahme zeigt eine Szene aus Glaitos Blickwinkel. Die Qualität ist erbärmlich, aber du erkennst die Halle, in der der Skulpteur das dunkle Ritual vollzieht. Du siehst Maive, die das Ritual stört, und den Strahl aus Warpenergie, der euch beide verbindet. Du hörst Solomornes Befehl. Die Szenerie verändert sich und du siehst Maive oder vielmehr dich selbst in Maives Körper durch die Straßen von Thassera streifen. Die nächste Aufnahme zeigt wieder die Halle, in der Solomorne auf den Altar feuert. Die Aufzeichnungen hallen als stechender Schmerz in deinen Muskeln wieder und legen sich wie ein Nebel auf deinen Verstand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'enregistrement montre une scène vue par Glaito. La qualité est exécrable, mais vous parvenez à distinguer la salle où le sculpteur accomplit son rituel sinistre. Vous voyez Maine perturber le rituel et le rayon d'énergie du Warp qui vous relie tous les deux. Vous entendez l'ordre de Solomorne, puis cette scène est remplacée par une autre montrant Maive, ou plutôt vous dans le corps de Maive, errant dans les rues de Thassera. La séquence suivante se déroule à nouveau dans la salle au moment où Solomorne tire sur l'autel. Les événements de cet enregistrement font jaillir un douloureux écho dans vos muscles ainsi qu'un brouillard dans votre esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The footage depicts a scene from Glaito's viewpoint. The quality is terrible, but you can make out the hall where the sculptor is conducting the sinister ritual. You see Maive interfere with the ritual, and the beam of warp energy connecting the two of you. You hear Solomorne's command. The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这段视讯记录通过格雷托的视角回放了当时的情形。尽管视讯质量很差，但你还是辨认出来，那正是雕刻师举行邪恶仪式的大厅。你看到梅芙干扰了仪式，看到了亚空间的能量束将你们两人连接在一起，也听到了索罗蒙吼出来的命令。随后，场景发生了变化，你看到了梅芙，或者更确切地说，是你被困在梅芙的身体里，在塔瑟拉的街道上游荡。接下来的片段又是在大厅里面，索罗蒙在祭坛上开火。你回想起了当时浑身刺痛的感觉，回想起了脑海中的迷雾。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The footage depicts a scene from Glaito's viewpoint. The quality is terrible, but you can make out the hall where the sculptor is conducting the sinister ritual. You see Maive interfere with the ritual, and the beam of warp energy connecting the two of you. You hear Solomorne's command. The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这段视讯记录通过格雷托的视角回放了当时的情形。尽管视讯质量很差，但你还是辨认出来，那正是雕刻师举行邪恶仪式的大厅。你看到梅芙干扰了仪式，看到了亚空间的能量束将你们两人连接在一起，也听到了索罗蒙吼出来的命令。随后，场景发生了变化，你看到了梅芙，或者更确切地说，是你被困在梅芙的身体里，在塔瑟拉的街道上游荡。接下来的片段又是在大厅里面，索罗蒙在祭坛上开火。你回想起了当时浑身刺痛的感觉，回想起了脑海中的迷雾。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La grabación muestra una escena desde el punto de vista de Glaito. La calidad es terrible, pero puedes identificar la sala en la que el escultor realizaba su siniestro ritual. Ves a Maive interferir con la ceremonia y el rayo de energía disforme os conecta a l{mf|o|a}s dos. Oyes la orden de Solomorne. La escena cambia y ves a Maive, o, mejor dicho, a ti mism{mf|o|a} en su cuerpo, vagando por las calles de Thassera. La siguiente escena os devuelve a la sala anterior y muestra a Solomorne disparando contra el altar. Los sucesos de la grabación están acompañados de un eco de dolor en tus músculos y embotamiento en tu cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The footage depicts a scene from Glaito's viewpoint. The quality is terrible, but you can make out the hall where the sculptor is conducting the sinister ritual. You see Maive interfere with the ritual, and the beam of warp energy connecting the two of you. You hear Solomorne's command. The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}映像はグライトの視点からのシーンを映している。画質はひどいが、彫刻家が邪悪な儀式を行っているホールの様子はかろうじてわかる。メイヴが儀式に干渉し、あなたと彼女をつなぐ〈歪み〉エネルギーのビームが見えた。ソロモーンの命令が聞こえる。シーンが変わり、メイヴ、というよりもメイヴの体に入ったあなた自身が、タッセーラの街をさまよっているのが映った。次のクリップでは再びソロモーンが祭壇を撃つホールに戻った。録画された出来事は、あなたの筋肉の引きずるような痛みと頭の中の霧となって反響した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The footage depicts a scene from Glaito's viewpoint. The quality is terrible, but you can make out the hall where the sculptor is conducting the sinister ritual. You see Maive interfere with the ritual, and the beam of warp energy connecting the two of you. You hear Solomorne's command. The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glatio'nun bakış açısından bir an resmediliyor. Görüntü kalitesi berbat olsa da heykeltıraşın uğursuz ayinini gerçekleştirdiği salonu tanıyorsun. Maive'in ayini bozduğunu ve bir öteboyut enerjisi ışınıyla birbirinize bağlandığınızı görüyorsun. Solomorne'un verdiği emri duyuyorsun. Sahne değişiyor ve Maive'i... Daha doğrusu Maive'in bedeninde kendini Thassera sokaklarında dolaşırken görüyorsun. Sıradaki sahne yine salonda geçiyor, Solomorne'un sunağa ateş açtığı görülüyor. Şimdi kaydını izlediğin olayların yankısına, kaslarındaki ağrı ve zihnindeki bulanıklık eşlik ediyor.{/n}

The scene changes and you see Maive, or rather, yourself in Maive's body, wandering through the streets of Thassera. The next clip brings you back to the hall where Solomorne is firing on the altar. The events in the recording are echoed by a dragging pain in your muscles and a fog in your head.{/n}
